text: A large number of devotees offered worship to Sri Anjaneya at various temples in the city on the occasion of Sri Hanuma Jayanthi on Saturday. Special abhishekams were performed on the occasion. Special pujai was performed at Sri Anjaneyar at Kallukuzhi. A garland of 1,00,008 ‘vadai’ and another one with equal number of ‘jangiri’ were offered to the deity in the morning. A large congregation of devotees offered worship to Sri Sanjeevana Anjaneyar in Srirangam.
title: Hanuma Jayanthi celebrated
